content:
Hello cda to fhir folks. Hoping to get some guidance...

When converting a c-cda to fhir, what resource/profile should be used to capture entries in the Interventions section? I have looked at the IG here (https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/ccda-on-fhir-r4/StructureDefinition-Continuity-of-Care-Document.html), but see no mention of Interventions.

Thanks for any help you can give.
Hi @Sarah Gaunt. Is there any chance you can take a look at this question? Thanks
Interventions are in Care Plan. So maybe CarePlan.activity? I haven't really looked carefully at the CarePlan stuff in FHIR.
They are here in C-CDA on FHIR: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/ccda-on-fhir-r4/StructureDefinition-Care-Plan-Document.html
C-CDA on FHIR doesn't use the FHIR CarePlan resource.
